mapper.insert: insert into tbl_point_log uid, bname, bnum, chk values(#{uid}, #{bname}, #{bnum}, #{chk})
mapper.select: select count(uid) from tbl_point_log where uid=#{uid}, bnum=#{bnum} and (select chk like 'vck' or chk like 'hck')
mapper.update: update tbl_board set like=#{like}, dislike=#{dislike} where bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.select: select uid from tbl_member where uname=#{usernick}
select usernick from tbl_board where bnum=#{bnum}
select replyer from tbl_reply where rnum=#{rnum}
mapper.update: update tbl_member_point set point = if(point<=0, 0, point)+#{point} where uid = #{uid}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_point_log where uid=#{uid} and bnum=#{bnum} and chk=#{chk}
delete from tbl_point_log where uid=#{uid} and rnum=#{rnum} and chk=#{chk}
